metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20150 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In WordPress before 4.9.9 and 5.x before 5.0.1, crafted URLs could triggerXSS for certain use cases involving plugins.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20150` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 5.0.1+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.0.1+dfsg1-1').
